definition: To cause severe damage or destruction to something, often resulting in its complete ruin or disintegration. This word is commonly used to describe the act of demolishing or annihilating objects, structures, or even abstract concepts.

examples.german: Der Krieg hat die Stadt zerstört.
Sie zerstören die Umwelt durch ihre Handlungen.
examples.english: They are destroying the environment through their actions.

examples.german: Das Feuer hat den Wald zerstört.
Die Naturkatastrophe hat viele Häuser zerstört.
examples.english: The natural disaster destroyed many houses.
